name: retab-vscode
description: tabs-first formatter for Proto, HCL, Terraform, and Dart files

retab.engine.description:
The formatting engine to use. WASM is recommended for best performance. Options:
- wasm: Uses WebAssembly for fastest performance
- go-tool: Uses 'go tool github.com/walteh/retab/v2/cmd/retab' (requires Go 1.24+)
- go-run: Uses 'go run github.com/walteh/retab/v2/cmd/retab@version'
- path: Uses 'retab' from system PATH
- local: Uses specified executable path

retab.executable.description: Path to the retab executable. Only used when engine is set to 'local'. Can be absolute or relative to workspace root.

retab.disable_wasm_fallback.description: Disable automatic fallback to WASM engine when other engines fail.

retab.format_tf_as_hcl.description: Format Terraform files (.tf, .tfvars) using the HCL formatter instead of the Terraform formatter.

retab.editorconfig.path.description: Optional path to a specific .editorconfig file. If not provided, retab will search for .editorconfig files starting from the file's directory up to the workspace root.
